STATE
v.
MABRY. No. COA08-729. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 3, 2009. Certification Date March 23, 2009. Appeal from Stanly (05CRS5906, 05CRS5907, 05CRS5908, 05CRS5909, 05CRS5910, 05CRS5911, 05CRS5912, 05CRS5913, 05CRS52890, 05CRS52891, 05CRS52892, 05CRS52893, 05CRS52894, 05CRS52895, 05CRS52896, 05CRS52897, 07CRS563, 07CRS564, 07CRS565, 07CRS50127, 07CRS50128, 07CRS50129).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part, vacated in part, remanded for resentencing.
